name: Templates_GetEnvelopeTemplates
description: This returns a list of the server-side templates, their name and ID, used in an envelope.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

include.description: The possible value is `matching_applied`, which returns template matching information for the template.

$ul: **templates**: An array of `templateSummary` objects that contain information about templates.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
